contents:
来自 Josh Hawley 的推特：

Josh Hawley‏ @HawleyMO

Great news. The #HKHumanRightsandDemocracyAct just hit the Senate hotline. Passage should be imminent. @marcorubio has been a champion on this and I’m proud to join him as cosponsor #StandWithHongKong
